mapper.select: SELECT article.article_id articleId, article.article_title articleTitle, article.article_release_date articleReleaseDate, article.article_content_html articleContentHtml, article.article_content_markdown articleContentMarkDown, article.article_user_id articleUserId, article.article_images articleImages, article.article_type articleType, article.article_status articleStatus, article.article_release_status articleReleaseStatus, article.article_comment_status articleCommentsStatus, article.article_top_status articleTopStatus, article.article_fine_note_status articleFineNoteStatus, article.approves_number approvesNumber, article.like_number likeNumber, article.read_number readNumber, article.comments_number commentsNumber, CASE WHEN user.nick_name IS NOT NULL THEN user.nick_name ELSE user.user_name END articleAuthor, user.avatar articleAuthorImage FROM manage_article article LEFT JOIN manage_user user ON article.article_user_id = user.user_id

SELECT article.article_id articleId, article.article_title articleTitle, article.article_release_date articleReleaseDate, article.article_content_html articleContentHtml, article.article_content_markdown articleContentMarkDown, article.article_user_id articleUserId, article.article_images articleImages, article.article_type articleType, article.article_status articleStatus, article.article_release_status articleReleaseStatus, article.article_comment_status articleCommentsStatus, article.article_top_status articleTopStatus, article.article_fine_note_status articleFineNoteStatus, article.approves_number approvesNumber, article.like_number likeNumber, article.read_number readNumber, article.comments_number commentsNumber FROM manage_article article WHERE article.article_id = #{articleId}
